name: Harshit Jaiswal
college: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology

certifications.title: Java Programming: Arrays, Lists, and Structured Data

education.school: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology

projects.name: Task Manager
projects.description: A task management application built using React and local storage, enabling creation, updating, and deletion of tasks.

projects.name: Boosting Indian Tourism - Trip Planner
projects.description: Developed a full-stack web application for hotel and homestay bookings in less-visited parts of India. Integrated an NLP-based recommendation system to suggest underrated tourist destinations based on user input. Enabled homeowners to register and manage properties for homestay services. Provided detailed descriptions of tourist places, including nearby accommodation options.

projects.name: Product Landing Page
projects.description: A product description page for a shoe company.

experiences.description: During my internship at Info aidTech, I gained hands-on experience in web development, refining my skills in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I engaged in project-based learning, creating projects such as a Product Landing Page, Simple Calculator, and Temperature Converter.

full_output.name: Harshit Jaiswal
achievements_and_awards: Won Impact-a-thon: SDG Edition at E-Summit 2024 | Contributed to gender equality initiatives. Created a solution addressing online harassment and gender bias.
